title: Enroll in Budget Billing
description: A customer wants to enroll in the budget billing program to have predictable monthly payments.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's usage history for the past 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully fetches the required historical data.

tasks.description: Calculate the estimated monthly budget billing amount by averaging the past year's bills.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the customer with their calculated monthly payment amount.

tasks.description: Explain how the program works, including the periodic settlement process, and enroll the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the terms and successfully enrolls the customer in the program.
